WRITING.TITLE: Leal, Scott spar over Roland's

WRITING.TEXT:
With a completed EJS, the record is accessible up to 2 years but the charge is still dismissed (or stayed depending on local practice). There are certain ppl who can access a youth record ONLY when the record is still accessible, meaning an EJS can be accessible for up to 2 years so they can retrieve that record within those 2 years.
At this point, the only way anything would show up on your record is if you were charged as an adult within the access period of your youth record. In that case, your youth record carries over and is part of your adult record. But this did not happen. An EJS is one of the least intrusive sentencing options in the YCJA, reserved for minor offences and not meant to hinder an offender's future prospects.
Nothing at all should be on your record, but if you want to put your mind completely at ease, what you could do is order a criminal record check from your local police force. Then you know for sure. It will not be a complete waste, criminal record checks are good to have for volunteer work or if you go on a school class trip with your child/niece/nephew etc.

Hello, youth probation officer here. Sounds like you were given an extra judicial sanction, meaning you are given a set of conditions to follow where, if met, the case is dismissed. Usually fingerprints aren't taken for these though but not completely impossible. Records for EJS are kept for 6 months up to 2 years. Even if found guilty theft is a summary offence and your record would only be accessible for 3 years after sentence completion. You're good to go.
Edit: Incomplete info- to make sure records are sealed, check with the arresting police force to ensure this has occurred. Even if they don't have direct access to that info they are a 1st point of contact and can at least confirm/deny whether your fingerprint files were destroyed.

WRITING.TITLE: Any tips for a rural user?
WRITING.TEXT: Hello, former user who had no luck streaming without pixelating and freezing. Signed up for a 1-day trial today and had a better experience, but wondering if there is anything I can do. So far, I set to random server (had it on Toronto but the program chose Montreal and it seemed to improve), turned off HQ streams, enabled InputStream Client for RTMP streams in Kodi. My speed is anywhere from 5-8 mbps download which ppl say is definitely good enough, I am just not having the success I feel I should be having. Any advice Re: anything else I can do, I'd appreciate it.
Will do. Thanks very much.

Nope, not happening. 5 min into a stream it pixelates and freezes. Any more comments would be appreciated. I turned off HQ video, chose a server location nearest me (Toronto) and that's all I changed.
Edit: Can someone tell me what "server type" is, RTMP vs HLS. I noticed I may have accidentally changed it to HLS, changed it to RTMP, it buffered a bit at first then it seemed to be OK. Edit2: now HLS seems way better. Obviously I have some exploring to do / decisions to make.

WRITING.TITLE: Antidepressant side effects
WRITING.TEXT:
Hi everyone, 1st time poster in this sub. Hope everyone takes care of themselves today. Anyway, depression sufferer for about 6 years now. Went through about 5 different antidepressants before getting off them about 3 months ago in favour of a cannabis subscription.
Results have been mixed. I do not do the cannabis everyday, and maybe if I did things would be better. But I'm feeling sad, angry, and just plain flat. I am thinking about going back on meds but the side effects on the most recent one I took included sweating through like 2-3 shirts per day and lack of sleep.
Any advice from people on a cannabis subscription OR who have struggled with their med regimen but finally found something that worked would be appreciated.
Thanks for the serious replies. I'm struggling a little bit myself. I'm skeptical that anger management would help for me since the underlying problem is depression.

WRITING.TITLE: Angry Redditors, did anger management help you? Why or why not?
Angry Redditors, did anger management help you?
WRITING.TEXT: [removed]
Grave-digger, age 12.

I was working retail and my supervisor was eating a hot dog. We were shooting the crap, me sweeping the floor and her at her desk eating. Suddenly she just went silent. I looked over and she was purple, trying to cough but nothing coming out. Dropped the broom, got behind her and did a pretty aggressive Heimlich maneuver- she was super tiny and I was lifting her right off her feet. Luckily, the piece of hot dog made its way up and she spit it out.
Of course it was my duty afterwards to remind her of the time she choked on the big wienie:)
Agreed. MIC is an awesome add on. Great selection, high-quality streams.

It has been said but it is true-RD will not help your live streams. I am not sure where there is a list of addons that work with RD. But take it from me, I am rural with not great internet speed-probably the minimal needed to even use Kodi. RD ensures you have the best stream available and they do seem to load a lot better.
